description.author: Dr. Alistair Ward
description.description: A chess-game which can be rendered in a terminal (emulator) in raw ASCII, or used as an engine by xboard.

package-flags.name: llvm
package-flags.description: Whether the 'llvm' compiler-backend has been installed and is required for code-generation.

package-flags.name: polyparse
package-flags.description: Link with package "polyparse" when available, rather than "parsec".

package-flags.name: hxtrelaxng
package-flags.description: Link with package "hxt-relaxng" when available, for more precise specification of the XML-configuration than a traditional DTD.
